/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/PointShadows.dir/main.cpp.o  -o PointShadows   -L"/home/marco/OpenGL Projects/PointShadows/ProjectFiles/./../RendererLibrary"  -Wl,-rpath,"/home/marco/OpenGL Projects/PointShadows/ProjectFiles/./../RendererLibrary" -lRendererLibrary -lGL -lGLU -lglfw -lGLEW -lassimp /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so
